name: Your Dream! Just! Do It!
description:
This small surreal adventure game inspired by Day of the Tentacle and Monkey Island was the winner of the dream-themed Trinity Game Jam sponsored by endgame and hosted by Live in the Game, Rogue Robot, and Propeller Bird at the University of Advancing Technology.

Credits
  • Adam Moore - Design & Programming
  • Kasey Harris - Design & Art
  • Seamless Kaboom - Music
  • Joshua Lin - Design
  • All sound effects were acquired royalty-free
